title: Sisyphus ffmpeg Schema
description: The Sisyphus ffmpeg schema to import `ffmpeg` options.

sources.description: The source files for ffmpeg to use.

source_maps.description: A map of the sources and the streams they contain.

source.description: The zero-index of the source file to use.

specifier.description: The specifier to use to identify streams in the source.

stream.description: The stream in the source file to use.

output_maps.description: A map of the selected source streams to the output file including options/settings.

specifier.description: The specifier to use to identify streams in the source.

stream.description: The stream to process from the source maps.

options.description: The options to use for processing the stream.
